Token.Abstract: A CatalyzeQuery is a developers tool for searching a custom class. CatalyzeQuery's are initialized with a class name which corresponds to a pre-defined custom class on the cataluze.io API. CatalyzeQuerys are used to search a single field to match a single value. These are specified by queryField and queryValue. Paging is also included with pageNumber and pageSize.
Initializes a CatalyzeQuery object with the given class name. This class name is used for URLs dealing with the custom class.

Parameter.Name: className
Parameter.Abstract: the name of the custom class on the catalyze.io API being queried.

Token.Abstract: Initializes a CatalyzeQuery object with the given class name. This class name is used for URLs dealing with the custom class.

Parameter.Name: newClassName
Parameter.Abstract: the name of the custom class on the catalyze.io API being queried.

Token.Abstract: The name of the custom class that this query is searching.
The name of the custom class that this query is searching.
The name of the custom class that this query is searching.
The name of the column to search in.
The name of the column to search in.
The name of the column to search in.
The value to look for in the column queryField.
The value to look for in the column queryField.
The value to look for in the column queryField.
The page number to get results from.
The page number to get results from.
The page number to get results from.
The size of the pages to retrieve results from.
The size of the pages to retrieve results from.
The size of the pages to retrieve results from.

Performs the query asynchronously. This should only be called after setting at minimum, the queryField and queryValue. Upon completion of the request, the CatalyzeArrayResultBlock is performed with the results of the query. This query requires administrator, superivsor, or the appropriate ACL permission level to query all entries in a custom class.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: the completion block to be executed upon the request's completion

Token.Abstract: Performs the query asynchronously. This should only be called after setting at minimum, the queryField and queryValue. Upon completion of the request, the given selector will be performed on the given target with the array of results as the object of the selector. This query requires administrator, superivsor, or the appropriate ACL permission level to query all entries in a custom class.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: the target to perform the given selector on the Main Thread upon the request's completion

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: the selector to be performed on the given target on the Main Thread upon the request's completion

Token.Abstract: Performs the query asynchronously. This should only be called after setting at minimum, the queryField and queryValue. Upon completion of the request, the CatalyzeArrayResultBlock is performed with the results of the query. This only queries for your own entries.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: the completion block to be executed upon the request's completion

Token.Abstract: Performs the query asynchronously. This should only be called after setting at minimum, the queryField and queryValue. Upon completion of the request, the given selector will be performed on the given target with the array of results as the object of the selector. This only queries for your own entries.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: the target to perform the given selector on the Main Thread upon the request's completion

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: the selector to be performed on the given target on the Main Thread upon the request's completion

Token.Abstract: Performs the query asynchronously. This should only be called after setting at minimum, the queryField and queryValue. Upon completion of the request, the CatalyzeArrayResultBlock is performed with the results of the query. This query searches all entries in a custom class that belong to the user with the given usersId. The user performing this query must have administrator, supervisor, or the appropriate ACL permissions to view the data belonging to that user.

Parameter.Name: usersId
Parameter.Abstract: the ID of the user whose entries are to be queried for

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: the completion block to be executed upon the request's completion

Token.Abstract: Performs the query asynchronously. This should only be called after setting at minimum, the queryField and queryValue. Upon completion of the request, the given selector will be performed on the given target with the array of results as the object of the selector. This query searches all entries in a custom class that belong to the user with the given usersId. The user performing this query must have administrator, supervisor, or the appropriate ACL permissions to view the data belonging to that user.

Parameter.Name: usersId
Parameter.Abstract: the ID of the user whose entries are to be queried for

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: the target to perform the given selector on the Main Thread upon the request's completion

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: the selector to be performed on the given target on the Main Thread upon the request's completion
